Game.Overview:
Blast through an addictive shooter where one wrong move could be your last.
Create incredible black holes using the touchscreen, blast asteroids to pieces using the dual analog sticks and deploy devastating shock waves with motion sensitive gameplay. Enjoy classic gameplay modes from Super Stardust HD and Super Stardust Portable, as well as new modes exclusive to PS Vita. Shoot your way to the top of the intergalactic leaderboards via PlayStation Network.
